metadata.description: Kick-Ass writer and The October Faction creator Steve Niles takes the horror to space! Who knows what mysteries lie deep in the asteroid belt? When a mysterious, huge, and previously undiscovered asteroid looms over their ship, a small crew of blue-collar workers discovers a terrifying threat unlike anything they’ve ever seen. Now the crew must escape the asteroid, but even if they do, will they be able to escape each other and anything they bring back with them?
metadata.name: Delta 13
